availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James T. Lee (Jefferson County, Kentucky, police officer and bookbinder)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, police officer and bookbinder. Kentucky native. Son of Francis Lee. Married to Mary C. Yarbinda Lee in Jefferson County, Kentucky on March 20, 1848. Married to Mary Ann Walton Lee in Jefferson County in August 1852. Father to Julia Lee, Benjamin Lee, and James H. Lee. Bookbinder in Jefferson County in 1850. Police officer in Jefferson County in 1856. Bookbinder in Jefferson County in 1860. Bookbinder in Jefferson County in 1865.
